nisakawa sandaha, ek winishchaya hela dakima mese wiya, namuth boho waradi kerehi karunawa yukthisahagatha wahanse ya. 5:17 namuth sandaha, ek waradak wisin, ek haraha maranaya rajakam kele ya, thawamath ese thawath boho ese karunawa wahala piliganna ayata ya, dimanawa saha yukthiya yana dekama, ek wana jesus kristhun wahanse karanakotagena jiwithaya rajakam. 5:18 ebawin, ek pilibanda warada karanakotagena, siyalu minisun lesa hela yatathe wati, kumak nisa da, ek yukthiya haraha, jiwanaya siyalu minisun yukthisahagatha yatathata. 5:19 sadaha, ek manushyayage, boho dena pawkarayan lesa sthapitha karana ladi, kumak nisa da, ek miniseku kikarukama karanakotagena, boho se sthapitha kala yuthu. 5:20 dan ithin nithiya waradi bahulawa athi bawa ewani kramayak athulu.

‘entaprayis shri lanka’ wyapthi kawuluwa lanka bankuwe di wiwrutha kere | asa padana rasa ‘entaprayis shri lanka’ wyapthi kawuluwa lanka bankuwe di wiwrutha kere rajaye mulika aarthika dakma wana ‘2025 di pohosath ratak’ yanna yatharthayak karawima sandaha diyath karana lada ‘entaprayis shri lanka’ wadasatahanata anuwa ehi wyapthi kawuluwa lanka banku pradhana karyalaye di wiwrutha kirima juli 18 dina mudal ha janamadhya amathya mangala samarawira mathithuma, rajya wyawasaya ha mahanuwara sanwardhana amathya lakshman kirialla mathithuma, mudal rajya amathya eran wikramarathna mathithuman athin sidukarana ladi.

wadawasam kramaya bindawati dhaneshwara artha kramaya yuropaye wyaptha wimath samanga kamkaruwa yana pudgala eekakaya kramayen nirmanaya wuni.dhanapathiyata abhimatha paridi kamkaruwage kramaya digin digatama sura kame prathipalayak washayen chikagowe kamkaruwo adata wasara ekasiya wisihathakata ihathadi siya aragalaya diyath kale jathyanthara kamkaru wijayagrahanayaka mul wedi muraya washayeni.biyen sakayen thorawa jiwath wimata sudusu parisaraya nirmanaya wuwa sema waraya widuli balagara mahamarga guwanthotupala palam jalasha aadi yodha sanwardhana wyapruthi rasak aarambha kara ema sanwardhanaye pala bhukthi windina awasthawata apa awathirna wi sitiyi.ewan awadhiyaka wadakarana janaya wenuwen peni sitina athigaru janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma kamkaru nayakayek lesa nirathuruwama peni sitiyi.
